target-enhancements.options.enable-targe: Allows user to hold down the 't' key when clicking to target tokens ** EXPERIMENTAL **
target-enhancements.options.use-player-c: Use player color for target indicator
target-enhancements.options.target-indic: Select the indicator for a targeted token
target-enhancements.options.enable-ctrl-: While holding <SHIFT>, user can resize the token using the mousewheel. The token MUST NOT BE SELECTED!
target-enhancements.options.enable-targe: Shows player avatar/npc tokens on targets. Disabling turns on the colored baubles.
